article.title: Indians Love India: UP Gets Highest Domestic Tourists

content.value: Domestic tourism seems to be doing well in India. The number of domestic tourist visits to the States and Union Territories during 2011, was 851 million. This is an increase of 13.8% over the number of visits in 2010; which was 748 million visits.Here are the top ten states in terms of number of domestic visits (in millions) during 2011.
